Reason: The configuration option 'inter_dc_stream_throughput_outbound_megabits_per_sec' in the 'cassandra' software project is performance-sensitive because it directly impacts the throughput of data transfer between data centers. Changing this value can significantly affect the overall system performance by either increasing or decreasing the outbound data transfer speed, leading to notable variations in execution time and potentially affecting the system's overall latency and throughput.
